column1: '''''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[9 December]] [[2013]].
